alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:41AM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, locally higher along the I-15 corridor. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Western Millard and Juab Counties, Sevier Valley and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions can be expected, particularly along higher summits of I-15 and I-70.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
